ygData.subject: OFF TOPIC:  Bards and Asherons Call
ygData.msgSnippet: i do not want this to turn into a discussion i just wanted to inform people that with the public release of Asherons Call a mailing list has been set up for
ygData.messageBody:
i do not want this to turn into a discussion i just wanted to inform people that with the public release of Asherons Call a mailing list has been set up for the bards of that world ACBards@onelist.com the problem is there is no bard class in Asherons Call. So in Beta Testing it has become a Roleplaying issue and not a class issue. You can sign up for the list at www.onelist.com

Thank you for your patience
Torenithus Legendmaker
Gentleman Bard of Qeynos
Wannabe Bard of Thisledown
